1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-drag2share
1.0.0.description:
WP-Drag2Share is a simple tool to share a post easily by drag and drop, this plugin supports social networks like Twitter, Delicious and Facebook.

This plugin is based on the script developed by Dan Wellman, achieving a better interface with

I made some changes. To see the original script, it can be read here: http://net.tutsplus.com/tutorials/javascript-ajax/drag-to-share

The plugin complies to GNU General Public License.

For more about this plugin visit http://craftyman.net/wp-drag2share-plugin-para-wordpress
